  • Methodendetails

    • begin

      public static <T extends ModelBuilder<T>> ItemLayerModelBuilder<T> begin(T parent, ExistingFileHelper existingFileHelper)

    • emissive

      public ItemLayerModelBuilder<T> emissive(int blockLight, int skyLight, int... layers)
      Marks a set of layers to be rendered emissively.
      Parameter:
      blockLight - The block light (0-15)
      skyLight - The sky light (0-15)
      layers - the layers that will render unlit
      Gibt zurück:
      this builder
      Löst aus:
      NullPointerException - if layers is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if layers is empty
      IllegalArgumentException - if any entry in layers is smaller than 0

    • color

      public ItemLayerModelBuilder<T> color(int color, int... layers)
      Marks a set of layers to be rendered with a specific color.
      Parameter:
      color - The color, in ARGB.
      layers - the layers that will render with color
      Gibt zurück:
      this builder
      Löst aus:
      NullPointerException - if layers is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if layers is empty
      IllegalArgumentException - if any entry in layers is smaller than 0

    • renderType

      public ItemLayerModelBuilder<T> renderType(String renderType, int... layers)
      Set the render type for a set of layers.
      Parameter:
      renderType - the render type. Must be registered via RegisterNamedRenderTypesEvent
      layers - the layers that will use this render type
      Gibt zurück:
      this builder
      Löst aus:
      NullPointerException - if renderType is null
      NullPointerException - if layers is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if layers is empty
      IllegalArgumentException - if any entry in layers is smaller than 0
      IllegalArgumentException - if any entry in layers already has a render type

    • renderType

      public ItemLayerModelBuilder<T> renderType(ResourceLocation renderType, int... layers)
      Set the render type for a set of layers.
      Parameter:
      renderType - the render type. Must be registered via RegisterNamedRenderTypesEvent
      layers - the layers that will use this render type
      Gibt zurück:
      this builder
      Löst aus:
      NullPointerException - if renderType is null
      NullPointerException - if layers is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if layers is empty
      IllegalArgumentException - if any entry in layers is smaller than 0
      IllegalArgumentException - if any entry in layers already has a render type
